hi all,
I'm starting to get into working with NEAT, and I was just wondering 
if anyone had any links to anything about the leaky integrator 
neuron, as I'm having a hard time finding any useful information, 
aside from that it useful in generating oscilliatory behavior.  
thanks,
David
